text: Margaret Elizabeth Philbin (born 23 June 1955) is an English television and radio presenter. She is best known for presenting the BBC programmes Tomorrow's World and Multi-Coloured Swap Shop. ==References== == Other websites == * Maggie Philbin on IMDb Category:1955 births Category:English television presenters Category:English radio personalities Category:Living people Category:People from Manchester
title: Maggie Philbin
